home.title: Discover the Meaning
home.subtitle: Enter any time to reveal its hidden spiritual message
home.loginToSave: Log in or sign up to save interpretations

auth.passwordHint: Must be at least 8 characters long

history.title: Your History
history.emptyState: You haven't saved any interpretations yet
history.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this interpretation from your history? This action cannot be undone.

toast.savedDescription: The interpretation for {{time}} has been saved to your history.
toast.loginDescription: You have been logged in successfully
toast.accountCreatedDescription: Your account has been created successfully

errors.invalidTime: Please enter a valid time in 24-hour format (e.g., 10:10)
errors.saveFailedDescription: There was an error saving this item to your history. Please try again.

share.shareText: Check out this mirror hour interpretation from MirrorTime!
share.downloadedDescription: The interpretation image has been saved to your device.
share.copiedDescription: The interpretation image has been copied to your clipboard.
share.sharedDescription: The interpretation image has been shared successfully.
share.errorGenerating: There was an error generating the image. Please try again.
share.errorCopying: There was an error copying the image. Please try downloading instead.
share.errorSharing: There was an error sharing the image. Please try another option.
share.fallbackDescription: Your browser doesn't support copying images. The image has been downloaded instead.

thoughts.prompt: What were you thinking or experiencing when you saw this time?
thoughts.placeholder: Share your thoughts, feelings, or what was happening when you noticed this time...

saved.title: Thoughts Saved
saved.description: Your thoughts have been saved successfully.

empty.title: Empty Thoughts
empty.description: Please enter your thoughts before saving.

error.title: Error Saving
error.description: There was an error saving your thoughts. Please try again.

loginRequired.title: Login Required
loginRequired.description: You need to be logged in to save your thoughts.
